string-array.name: Eightball
string-array.item: the scent of death is strong where you are
you are arressted on trumped up charges
you fell out of a tree, despite not being in a tree
you rolled a nat one on your relevant ability check
you do not pass go, and do not collect 200 dollars
you find a bag with two empty bears, two empty breath meant packs, and two empty five hour energy drinks in the parking lot
a rock hits you in the back of the head
a black cat crossed your path
